newsitem.title: USA: Hollywood Showcase to make acquisition.
newsitem.headline: Hollywood Showcase to make acquisition.

text.p: Hollywood Showcase Television Network Inc on Tuesday said it signed a letter of intent to acquire Los Angeles-based Television Marketing Group Inc in a stock swap.
The privately held Television Marketing Group markets products via long-format television advertisements known as infomercials, direct-response advertising, direct sales and retail distribution.
Television Marketing forecasts 1997 sales of more than $28 million, Hollywood Showcase said in a statement.
